thread.title: Lady Gaga to headline Rock in Rio
thread.title_full: Lady Gaga to headline Rock in Rio

author: Agence France-Presse
title: Lady Gaga to headline Rock in Rio
text:
Entertainment News Lady Gaga to headline Rock in Rio Lady Gaga is set to join groups such as Aerosmith, Bon Jovi, and the Red Hot Chili Peppers for the Rock in Rio music festival this September Published 10:54  54   RIO TOUR. Lady Gaga is set to perform in Rio de Janeiro this September for the Rock in Rio festival. Photo shows the singer during the Pepsi Zero Sugar Super Bowl 51 Halftime Show at NRG Stadium on February 5 in Houston, Texas. Photo by Al Bello/Getty Images/AFP RIO DE JANEIRO , Brazil â€“ Lady Gaga will headline the Rock in Rio festival for the first time, organizers in Brazil confirmed Monday, February 6. 
The US superstar, who will be on her newly announced Joanne World Tour, will stop in Rio de Janeiro on September 15 for the opening night of the latest edition of the annual festival, rockinrio.com announced. 
Also playing at the September 15-24 event, staged at the Rio's Olympic Park, will be groups including Aerosmith, Bon Jovi and Red Hot Chili Peppers. 
Lady Gaga, one of the world's best known pop stars, was a critical hit on Sunday, February 5 with her halftime show at the Superbowl in Houston, although she shied away from what many had thought would be a moment of political protest. 
Shortly after the performance she announced the Joanne Tour, named after her most recent album, on Twitter. 
Lady Gaga has previously performed in Brazil, playing Sao Paulo, Rio and Porto Alegre during a 2012 tour.
